title:
Low-Complexity SVM Signal Recovery in Bandwidth-Limited 100Gb/s PAM4 PON
  Upstream
authors: Liyan Wu, Yanlu Huang, Kai Jin, Shangya Han, Kun Xu, Yanni Ou
abstract:
We proposed a low-complexity SVM-based signal recovery algorithm and
evaluated it in 100G-PON with 25G-class devices. For the first time, it
experimentally achieved 24 dB power budget @ FEC threshold 1E-3 over 40 km SMF,
improving receiver sensitivity over 2 dB compared to FFE&DFE.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Signal Processing
